channel.title: Timer Question
channel.description:
Is it possible to create a timer that would hold an action untill the timer has counted down?
Like say if i wanted to cast a spell... I'd turn to face the NPC or Player then the timer would kick in... And that would hold the "ProjectileSpell" untill the timer has finished counting down... Can anyone understand and/or help me?

item.title: Timer Question
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

What the hell is that man?

Read full topic

item.title: Timer Question
item.dc:creator: @S_C_A_R_Bot S C A R Bot
item.description:
@S_C_A_R_Bot wrote:

try { thread.sleep(99); } catch(Exception e) { print.ln("Oh noez ! FAILED!"); } }

Sumthin liek dat.
